verses.verse: כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> When יְרַחֵ֨ם <S%H7355><s%> will have mercy יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> For the LORD אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> יַעֲקֹ֗ב <S%H3290><s%> on Jacob וּבָחַ֥ר <S%H977><s%> and will yet choose עוֹד֙ <S%H5750><s%> and again בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel וְהִנִּיחָ֖ם <S%H3240><s%> and set עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> their own אַדְמָתָ֑ם <S%H127><s%> them in their own land וְנִלְוָ֤ה <S%H3867><s%> shall be joined הַגֵּר֙ <S%H1616><s%> and the strangers עֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H5921><s%> and וְנִסְפְּח֖וּ <S%H5596><s%> with them and they shall cleave עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> to the house יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob

וּלְקָח֣וּם <S%H3947><s%> shall take עַמִּים֮ <S%H5971><s%> And the people וֶהֱבִיא֣וּם <S%H935><s%> them and bring אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מְקוֹמָם֒ <S%H4725><s%> them to their place וְהִֽתְנַחֲל֣וּם <S%H5157><s%> shall possess בֵּֽית־ <S%H1004><s%> and the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> in אַדְמַ֣ת <S%H127><s%> them in the land יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לַעֲבָדִ֖ים <S%H5650><s%> for servants וְלִשְׁפָח֑וֹת <S%H8198><s%> and handmaids וְהָיוּ֙ <S%H1961><s%> will take שֹׁבִ֣ים <S%H7617><s%> and they shall take them captives לְשֹֽׁבֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H7617><s%> whose captives וְרָד֖וּ <S%H7287><s%> they were and they shall rule בְּנֹגְשֵׂיהֶֽם׃ <S%H5065><s%> over their oppressors ס

וְהָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> will be in בְּי֨וֹם <S%H3117><s%> And it shall come to pass in the day הָנִ֤יחַ <S%H5117><s%> shall give thee rest יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD לְךָ֔ מֵֽעָצְבְּךָ֖ <S%H6090><s%> from thy sorrow וּמֵרָגְזֶ֑ךָ <S%H7267><s%> and from thy fear וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הָעֲבֹדָ֥ה <S%H5656><s%> bondage הַקָּשָׁ֖ה <S%H7186><s%> and from the hard אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which עֻבַּד־ <S%H5647><s%> wherein thou wast made to serve בָּֽךְ׃

וְנָשָׂ֜אתָ <S%H5375><s%> That thou shalt take up הַמָּשָׁ֥ל <S%H4912><s%> this proverb הַזֶּ֛ה <S%H2088><s%> this עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> against the king בָּבֶ֖ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon וְאָמָ֑רְתָּ <S%H559><s%> and say אֵ֚יךְ <S%H349><s%> How שָׁבַ֣ת <S%H7673><s%> ceased נֹגֵ֔שׂ <S%H5065><s%> How hath the oppressor שָׁבְתָ֖ה <S%H7673><s%> ceased מַדְהֵבָֽה׃ <S%H4062><s%> the golden city

שָׁבַ֥ר <S%H7665><s%> hath broken יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD מַטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> the staff רְשָׁעִ֑ים <S%H7563><s%> of the wicked שֵׁ֖בֶט <S%H7626><s%> [and] the sceptre מֹשְׁלִֽים׃ <S%H4910><s%> of the rulers

מַכֶּ֤ה <S%H5221><s%> He who smote עַמִּים֙ <S%H5971><s%> the people בְּעֶבְרָ֔ה <S%H5678><s%> in wrath מַכַּ֖ת <S%H4347><s%> stroke בִּלְתִּ֣י <S%H1115><s%> because סָרָ֑ה <S%H5627><s%> continual רֹדֶ֤ה <S%H7287><s%> he that ruled בָאַף֙ <S%H639><s%> in anger גּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> the nations מֻרְדָּ֖ף <S%H4783><s%> is persecuted בְּלִ֥י <S%H1097><s%> [and] none חָשָֽׂךְ׃ <S%H2820><s%> hindereth

נָ֥חָה <S%H5117><s%> is at rest שָׁקְטָ֖ה <S%H8252><s%> [and] is quiet כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> the whole הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> The whole earth פָּצְח֖וּ <S%H6476><s%> they break forth רִנָּֽה׃ <S%H7440><s%> into singing

גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> Even בְּרוֹשִׁ֛ים <S%H1265><s%> Yea the fir trees שָׂמְח֥וּ <S%H8055><s%> rejoice לְךָ֖ אַרְזֵ֣י <S%H730><s%> at thee [and] the cedars לְבָנ֑וֹן <S%H3844><s%> of Lebanon מֵאָ֣ז <S%H227><s%> for שָׁכַ֔בְתָּ <S%H7901><s%> [saying] Since thou art laid down לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no יַעֲלֶ֥ה <S%H5927><s%> is come up הַכֹּרֵ֖ת <S%H3772><s%> no feller עָלֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H5921><s%> against

שְׁא֗וֹל <S%H7585><s%> Hell מִתַּ֛חַת <S%H8478><s%> Thahash רָגְזָ֥ה <S%H7264><s%> from beneath is moved לְךָ֖ לִקְרַ֣את <S%H7125><s%> for thee to meet בּוֹאֶ֑ךָ <S%H935><s%> [thee] at thy coming עוֹרֵ֨ר <S%H5782><s%> it stirreth up לְךָ֤ רְפָאִים֙ <S%H7496><s%> the dead כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עַתּ֣וּדֵי <S%H6260><s%> for thee [even] all the chief ones אָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth הֵקִים֙ <S%H6965><s%> it hath raised up מִכִּסְאוֹתָ֔ם <S%H3678><s%> from their thrones כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all מַלְכֵ֥י <S%H4428><s%> all the kings גוֹיִֽם׃ <S%H1471><s%> of the nations

כֻּלָּ֣ם <S%H3605><s%> will all יַֽעֲנ֔וּ <S%H6030><s%> All they shall speak וְיֹאמְר֖וּ <S%H559><s%> and say אֵלֶ֑יךָ <S%H413><s%> to you גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> Even אַתָּ֛ה <S%H859><s%> you חֻלֵּ֥יתָ <S%H2470><s%> unto thee Art thou also become weak כָמ֖וֹנוּ <S%H3644><s%> as אֵלֵ֥ינוּ <S%H413><s%> we נִמְשָֽׁלְתָּ׃ <S%H4911><s%> as we? art thou become like

הוּרַ֥ד <S%H3381><s%> is brought down שְׁא֛וֹל <S%H7585><s%> to the grave גְּאוֹנֶ֖ךָ <S%H1347><s%> Thy pomp הֶמְיַ֣ת <S%H1998><s%> [and] the noise נְבָלֶ֑יךָ <S%H5035><s%> of thy viols תַּחְתֶּ֙יךָ֙ <S%H8478><s%> beneath יֻצַּ֣ע <S%H3331><s%> is spread רִמָּ֔ה <S%H7415><s%> the worm וּמְכַסֶּ֖יךָ <S%H4374><s%> cover תּוֹלֵעָֽה׃ <S%H8438><s%> under thee and the worms

אֵ֛יךְ <S%H349><s%> How נָפַ֥לְתָּ <S%H5307><s%> How art thou fallen מִשָּׁמַ֖יִם <S%H8064><s%> from heaven הֵילֵ֣ל <S%H1966><s%> O Lucifer בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> son שָׁ֑חַר <S%H7837><s%> of the dawn נִגְדַּ֣עְתָּ <S%H1438><s%> [how] art thou cut down לָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> to the ground חוֹלֵ֖שׁ <S%H2522><s%> which didst weaken עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and גּוֹיִֽם׃ <S%H1471><s%> the nations

וְאַתָּ֞ה <S%H859><s%> you אָמַ֤רְתָּ <S%H559><s%> For thou hast said בִֽלְבָבְךָ֙ <S%H3824><s%> in thine heart הַשָּׁמַ֣יִם <S%H8064><s%> into heaven אֶֽעֱלֶ֔ה <S%H5927><s%> I will ascend מִמַּ֥עַל <S%H4605><s%> above לְכֽוֹכְבֵי־ <S%H3556><s%> the stars אֵ֖ל <S%H410><s%> of God אָרִ֣ים <S%H7311><s%> I will exalt כִּסְאִ֑י <S%H3678><s%> my throne וְאֵשֵׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> I will sit בְּהַר־ <S%H2022><s%> also upon the mount מוֹעֵ֖ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation בְּיַרְכְּתֵ֥י <S%H3411><s%> in the sides צָפֽוֹן׃ <S%H6828><s%> of the north

אֶעֱלֶ֖ה <S%H5927><s%> I will ascend עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> above בָּ֣מֳתֵי <S%H1116><s%> above the heights עָ֑ב <S%H5645><s%> of the clouds אֶדַּמֶּ֖ה <S%H1819><s%> I will be like לְעֶלְיֽוֹן׃ <S%H5945><s%> the most High

אַ֧ךְ <S%H389><s%> Nevertheless אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שְׁא֛וֹל <S%H7585><s%> to hell תּוּרָ֖ד <S%H3381><s%> Yet thou shalt be brought down אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יַרְכְּתֵי־ <S%H3411><s%> to the sides בֽוֹר׃ <S%H953><s%> of the pit

רֹאֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H7200><s%> They that see אֵלֶ֣יךָ <S%H413><s%> over יַשְׁגִּ֔יחוּ <S%H7688><s%> thee shall narrowly look אֵלֶ֖יךָ <S%H413><s%> over יִתְבּוֹנָ֑נוּ <S%H995><s%> upon thee [and] consider הֲזֶ֤ה <S%H2088><s%> you is this הָאִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> thee [saying Is] this the man מַרְגִּ֣יז <S%H7264><s%> to tremble הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> that made the earth מַרְעִ֖ישׁ <S%H7493><s%> that did shake מַמְלָכֽוֹת׃ <S%H4467><s%> kingdoms

שָׂ֥ם <S%H7760><s%> [That] made תֵּבֵ֛ל <S%H8398><s%> the world כַּמִּדְבָּ֖ר <S%H4057><s%> as a wilderness וְעָרָ֣יו <S%H5892><s%> the cities הָרָ֑ס <S%H2040><s%> and destroyed אֲסִירָ֖יו <S%H615><s%> his prisoners לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not פָ֥תַח <S%H6605><s%> thereof [that] opened בָּֽיְתָה׃ <S%H1004><s%> not the house

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All מַלְכֵ֥י <S%H4428><s%> All the kings גוֹיִ֖ם <S%H1471><s%> of the nations כֻּלָּ֑ם <S%H3605><s%> All שָׁכְב֥וּ <S%H7901><s%> [even] all of them lie בְכָב֖וֹד <S%H3519><s%> in glory אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every one בְּבֵיתֽוֹ׃ <S%H1004><s%> in his own house

וְאַתָּ֞ה <S%H859><s%> you הָשְׁלַ֤כְתָּ <S%H7993><s%> But thou art cast out מִֽקִּבְרְךָ֙ <S%H6913><s%> of thy grave כְּנֵ֣צֶר <S%H5342><s%> branch נִתְעָ֔ב <S%H8581><s%> like an abominable לְב֥וּשׁ <S%H3830><s%> [and as] the raiment הֲרֻגִ֖ים <S%H2026><s%> of those that are slain מְטֹ֣עֲנֵי <S%H2944><s%> thrust through חָ֑רֶב <S%H2719><s%> with a sword יוֹרְדֵ֥י <S%H3381><s%> that go down אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַבְנֵי־ <S%H68><s%> to the stones ב֖וֹר <S%H953><s%> of the pit כְּפֶ֥גֶר <S%H6297><s%> as a carcase מוּבָֽס׃ <S%H947><s%> trodden under feet

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not תֵחַ֤ד <S%H3161><s%> Thou shalt not be joined אִתָּם֙ <S%H854><s%> in בִּקְבוּרָ֔ה <S%H6900><s%> with them in burial כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Because אַרְצְךָ֥ <S%H776><s%> thy land שִׁחַ֖תָּ <S%H7843><s%> because thou hast destroyed עַמְּךָ֣ <S%H5971><s%> thy people הָרָ֑גְתָּ <S%H2026><s%> [and] slain לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יִקָּרֵ֥א <S%H7121><s%> be renowned לְעוֹלָ֖ם <S%H5769><s%> shall never זֶ֥רַע <S%H2233><s%> the seed מְרֵעִֽים׃ <S%H7489><s%> of evildoers

הָכִ֧ינוּ <S%H3559><s%> Prepare לְבָנָ֛יו <S%H1121><s%> for his children מַטְבֵּ֖חַ <S%H4293><s%> slaughter בַּעֲוֹ֣ן <S%H5771><s%> for the iniquity אֲבוֹתָ֑ם <S%H1><s%> of their fathers בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> that they do not יָקֻ֙מוּ֙ <S%H6965><s%> rise וְיָ֣רְשׁוּ <S%H3423><s%> nor possess אָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land וּמָלְא֥וּ <S%H4390><s%> nor fill פְנֵֽי־ <S%H6440><s%> the face תֵבֵ֖ל <S%H8398><s%> of the world עָרִֽים׃ <S%H5892><s%> cities

וְקַמְתִּ֣י <S%H6965><s%> For I will rise up עֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H5921><s%> against נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> against them saith יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3069><s%> God צְבָא֑וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts וְהִכְרַתִּ֨י <S%H3772><s%> and cut off לְבָבֶ֜ל <S%H894><s%> from Babylon שֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> the name וּשְׁאָ֛ר <S%H7605><s%> and remnant וְנִ֥ין <S%H5209><s%> and son וָנֶ֖כֶד <S%H5220><s%> and nephew נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> God

וְשַׂמְתִּ֛יהָ <S%H7760><s%> I will also make לְמוֹרַ֥שׁ <S%H4180><s%> it a possession קִפֹּ֖ד <S%H7090><s%> for the bittern וְאַגְמֵי־ <S%H98><s%> and pools מָ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> of water וְטֵֽאטֵאתִ֙יהָ֙ <S%H2894><s%> and I will sweep בְּמַטְאֲטֵ֣א <S%H4292><s%> it with the besom הַשְׁמֵ֔ד <S%H8045><s%> of destruction נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <S%H6635><s%> of hosts פ

נִשְׁבַּ֛ע <S%H7650><s%> hath sworn יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo לֹ֞א <S%H3808><s%> as כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> I דִּמִּ֙יתִי֙ <S%H1819><s%> Surely as I have thought כֵּ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> so הָיָ֔תָה <S%H1961><s%> has happened וְכַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> I יָעַ֖צְתִּי <S%H3289><s%> so shall it come to pass and as I have purposed הִ֥יא <S%H1931><s%> it תָקֽוּם׃ <S%H6965><s%> [so] shall it stand
